title: Tamarind prawns
description: Tamarind and honey make a wonderfully sweet and sour marinade for delicate prawns. Serve tapas style or with a salad.
ingredients: 3–4 tbsp chilli oil, or olive oil if preferred
800g/1lb 12oz raw tiger prawns (the biggest you can find), ideally peeled but with tails left on
10g fresh coriander, leaves picked and roughly chopped
3 spring onions, trimmed and thinly sliced from root to tip
